pull.title: depends: sqlite 3.50.4; switch to autosetup
pull.body: Migrate to SQLite `3.50.4` in depends; switching to its new [Autosetup](https://msteveb.github.io/autosetup/) build system.

tree 6984141dbe86c05724a2624547a7cc2505dc4f2c

guix: sqlite wants tcl

tree a0fc2e532b84ebe656f64682fb7d22e8274adbf1
parent febc218fec136b91f1bddd195d0493e548fdde57
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1748686068 +0100
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1761653521 +0000

depends: sqlite 3.50.4

Migrate to the new Autosetup build system (introduced in 3.48.0).
See https://msteveb.github.io/autosetup/.
Also: https://sqlite.org/releaselog/3_50_0.html.

events.message:
depends: sqlite 3.50.4

Migrate to the new Autosetup build system (introduced in 3.48.0).
See https://msteveb.github.io/autosetup/.
Also: https://sqlite.org/releaselog/3_50_0.html.

events.body: Rebased for #33185 and dropped the [nomerge] `--with-pic` commit.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -17,6 +17,7 @@
              ((gnu packages python) #:select (python-minimal))
              ((gnu packages python-build) #:select (python-tomli python-poetry-core))
              ((gnu packages python-crypto) #:select (python-asn1crypto))
+             (gnu packages tcl)
comments.body: How does this affect the overall dependency graph?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -17,6 +17,7 @@
              ((gnu packages python) #:select (python-minimal))
              ((gnu packages python-build) #:select (python-tomli python-poetry-core))
              ((gnu packages python-crypto) #:select (python-asn1crypto))
+             (gnu packages tcl)
comments.body:
`tcl` was already included in the build environment as a runtime dependency for `python` via `ninja -> python-wrapper -> python`.

With this change, no new runtime dependencies are included in the build environment. The only difference is that `tclsh` (and other helper binaries included in the `tcl` package) are now available on `PATH`.
